00012 #define MBIG 1000000000
00013 #define MSEED 161803398
00014 #define MZ 0
00015 #define FAC (1.0/MBIG)
00016 
00017 
00020 // to encapsulate all the random number generators
00022 class RandomGenerator
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     static void reinit() {
00026         initialised_ = false;
00027     }
00028 //  static bool probability_trial_for_time_step(volatile double &);
00029     static bool probability_trial_for_time_step(const double &);
00030     static int iran(const int &);
00031     static double dran(const double &);
00032     static double gran(const double &);
00033 private:
00034     static double ran();
00035     static bool initialised_;
00036 };

00039 
00041 // RandomGenerator inline definition
00043 
00045 // generator
00046 // according to Knuth, any large MBIG, and any smaller (but still large) MSEED can be substituted for the above values
00047 // returns a uniform pseudo-random variate between 0 and 1.
00048 // set 'initialised' to false to reinitialize or reinitialize the sequence
00049 inline double RandomGenerator::ran()
00050 {
00051     // the value 56 (range ma_[1..55]) is special and should not be modified; see Knuth
00052     static int inext_, inextp_;
00053     static long ma_[56];
00054     long mj, mk;
00055     int i, ii, k;
00056     if (! initialised_) {
00057         // Initialization
00058         mj = fabs(MSEED - fabs(SimEnv::random_init_seed()));
00059         // Initialize ma_[55] using the seed idum and the large number MSEED
00060         mj %= MBIG;
00061         ma_[55] = mj;
00062         mk = 1;
00063         for (i = 1; i <= 54; ++i) {
00064             ii = (21 * i) % 55;
00065             ma_[ii] = mk;
00066             mk = mj - mk;
00067             if (mk < MZ) mk += MBIG;
00068             mj = ma_[ii];
00069         }
00070         for (k = 1; k <= 4; ++k)
00071             for (i = 1; i <= 55; ++i) {
00072                 ma_[i] -= ma_[1+(i+30) % 55];
00073                 if (ma_[i] < MZ) ma_[i] += MBIG;
00074             }
00075         inext_ = 0;
00076         inextp_ = 31;
00077         initialised_ = true;
00078     }
00079 
00080     if (++inext_ == 56) inext_ = 1;
00081     if (++inextp_ == 56) inextp_ = 1;
00082     mj = ma_[inext_] - ma_[inextp_];
00083     if (mj < MZ) mj += MBIG;
00084     ma_[inext_] = mj;
00085     return mj*FAC;
00086 }

00089 
00090 #undef MBIG
00091 #undef MSEED
00092 #undef MZ
00093 #undef FAC
00094 
00095 #endif // !defined(RANDOMGENERATOR_H)
